name: Mummy
lore: Mummies are undead creatures whose bodies have been preserved through ancient rituals or dark magic. Bound to guard sacred tombs and cursed treasures, they arise to destroy any who dare intrude upon their eternal rest. The desiccated corpse of a mummy is wrapped in decaying linen and radiates an aura of dread that can paralyze the living with fear. Those struck by a mummy's cursed fist may be afflicted with mummy rot, a terrible curse that prevents healing and slowly wastes the victim away to dust.
resistances: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks

languages.notes: The languages it knew in life

multiattack.description: The mummy makes two Rotting Fist attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Dreadful Glare.

actions.name: Rotting Fist
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain Hit Points, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's Hit Point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust.

hit.additionalEffects: If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot.

onFailure.effects: The target is cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain Hit Points, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's Hit Point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust.

actions.name: Dreadful Glare
actions.description: The mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or have the Frightened condition until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it also has the Paralyzed condition for the same duration.

savingThrow.targets: one creature the mummy can see within 60 feet

conditions.duration: until the end of the mummy's next turn
